objective: Make workflow drafting canvas nodes interactive so users can inspect and configure node requirements via a right-side info pane, launch provider playgrounds (OpenAPI Swagger, GraphQL), and refine queries (JQL) with an agent-assisted configuration loop.
nonGoals: Implement database query playgrounds (SQL, MongoDB, Gremlin) in v1
Implement embedded (in-pane) Swagger/GraphiQL; v1 uses new-tab launch
Implement production-grade provider connectivity for all providers beyond Jira PoC (e.g., GitLab) without a spec artifact present in-repo
